nodes.text: Disney Parks Wishables is a series of toys sold exclusively at Disney's ShopDisney.com and the Disney Store, as well as various Disney theme parks, featuring small plush toys based on theme park attractions. Most are sold in "blind packs," including one of four different toys; which one is unknown until the bag is opened.

In May of 2021, the Star Tours Attraction Series of Wishables was released. The blind pack included either C-3PO, a stormtrooper, a StarSpeeder 1000, or the original Star Tours version of RX-24. The StarSpeeder 3000 was available as a limited "chase" variant. A single, separate R2-D2 Wishable was also released.
